name: Brian Harris
subject: Question about t-shirt sizing
message: Hello, I'm 1.75m tall and weigh 68kg. Which t-shirt size should I get? I want a fitted look, not too loose. Please advise. Thanks!

name: Alex Turner
subject: Order inquiry
message: Hello, I placed order #2002 last week but haven't received shipping information yet. Could you please check on this for me? Thank you!

name: Steven Brown
subject: Business partnership
message: Dear Veloura, I represent a chain of fashion stores in Hanoi. We are interested in partnering to distribute Veloura products. Looking forward to discussing further. Best regards!

name: Kevin Davis
subject: Product review
message: Just received the white Oxford dress shirt, the quality is amazing! Beautiful fabric, perfect fit, carefully packaged. Very satisfied and will recommend to friends. Thank you!

name: Ryan Mitchell
subject: Size exchange request
message: Hello, I purchased jeans in size 31 but they're a bit tight. Can I exchange for size 32? The product still has tags and is unused. I'm located in Ho Chi Minh City.
